title: Game Development Using Unity 3D and Mapbox
headline: This free online course will equip you with the skills you need to develop games using Mapbox and Unity 3D.
description: Unity 3D stands out as one of the best engines in game development due to its highly customizable rendering technology, quick iteration time, and cross-platform compatibility. Mapbox is a location data platform. This step-by-step course was created for Unity 3D developers to learn how to create games from real-world data using Mapbox's tools and services to offer advanced and flexible map services that can be integrated into mobile games.

courseDescription:
This course is a complete guide to developing games in Unity 3D using real-world data from Mapbox, a map service, and API that provides developers with access to detailed location data and allows them to embed styled maps into games. This self-paced course begins with a brief overview of Mapbox, after which you will learn how to set up the game scene, add elements, sounds, and points of interest.

Learn how to use filters to improve the map's user interface and performance, as well as how to create a game project and add players to the scene. Discover the best settings for creating Android games, as well as how to dynamically assign map locations, create singletons, and use the game droid factory. Finally, you learn about the platform-dependent compiler, as well as how to create and implement the game manager, improve the UI controller, prepare it for deployment, and load and save player data.

Most modern games now include mapping functionality as a standard feature. This course is specially designed for Unity developers who want to take their game development skills to the next level. It includes detailed tutorial videos to help you fully understand how to build games using real-world data. By taking this free course, you can advance your game development career to the next level. Enroll to start now!
